overview: Dark. Squalid. Ominous. Young Lucy awakes to the surroundings of a derelict hospital. Struck with amnesia, Lucy is the victim of her own unruly flashbacks - exposing her hedonist and malicious past. As the pieces reconnect, she finds that the hospital staff has come to reap vengeance on this not-so-innocent girl and with a little 'experimental' brain surgery, seek to purge Lucy of her demons. Director Benny Profane returns to the scene of the crime with his VividAlt. debut; achieving nothing short of a new level of dementia.
title: Hospital!
